elements.name: Helium
elements.discovered by: Sir William Ramsay in London, and independently by Per Teodor Cleve and Nils Abraham Langlet in Uppsala, Sweden

elements.name: Boron
elements.discovered by: Louis-Josef Gay-Lussac and Louis-Jacques Thénard in Paris, France, and Humphry Davy in London, UK

elements.name: Oxygen
elements.discovered by: Joseph Priestley in Wiltshire, England and independently by Carl Wilhelm Scheele in Uppsala, Sweden

elements.name: Neon
elements.discovered by: Sir William Ramsay and Morris Travers

elements.name: Argon
elements.discovered by: Lord Rayleigh and Sir William Ramsay

elements.name: Zinc
elements.discovery date: Identified as an element in 1746, but known to the Greeks and Romans before 20BC.

elements.name: Bromine
elements.discovered by: Antoine-Jérôme Balard in Montpellier, France and Carl Löwig in Heidelberg, Germany

elements.name: Krypton
elements.discovered by: Sir William Ramsay and Morris Travers
